seed_pair: Why are you learning her name?
¿Por qué estás aprendiendo su nombre?
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'why' → 'por qué' (question word, A-type). 'are you learning' → 'estás aprendiendo' (present continuous, must keep together for FD, M-type). 'her name' → 'su nombre' (possessive+noun, pragmatic FD: 'her' alone can't generate practice, M-type). TILING: por qué + estás aprendiendo + su nombre ✅

seed_pair: Because I want to meet people who speak Spanish.
Porque quiero encontrar personas que hablan español.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'because' → 'porque' (A-type). 'I want' → 'quiero' (A-type). 'to meet' → 'encontrar' (A-type). 'people' → 'personas' (A-type). 'who speak' → 'que hablan' (relative pronoun + verb, 'who' alone ambiguous, M-type). 'Spanish' → 'español' (A-type). TILING: porque + quiero + encontrar + personas + que hablan + español ✅

seed_pair: I'm going to start talking more soon.
Voy a comenzar a hablar más pronto.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I'm going to' → 'voy a' (FD required, M-type). 'to start talking' → 'comenzar a hablar' (pattern: English gerund 'talking' → Spanish 'a + infinitive', M-type). 'more' → 'más' (A-type). 'soon' → 'pronto' (A-type). TILING: voy a + comenzar a hablar + más + pronto ✅

seed_pair: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.
No voy a poder recordar fácilmente.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'not' → 'no' (standalone useful, A-type). 'I'm going to' → 'voy a' (M-type, already extracted). 'to be able to' → 'poder' (modal verb, A-type). 'to remember' → 'recordar' (A-type). 'easily' → 'fácilmente' (A-type). TILING: no + voy a + poder + recordar + fácilmente ✅

seed_pair: Are you going to help me before I have to go?
¿Vas a ayudarme antes de que tenga que ir?
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'are you going to' → 'vas a' (M-type, 2nd person). 'to help me' → 'ayudarme' (infinitive + attached pronoun, M-type pattern). 'before I have to' → 'antes de que tenga que' (subjunctive trigger + verb, M-type per v6.2 FD validation). 'to go' → 'ir' (A-type). CRITICAL: 'tenga' is subjunctive triggered by 'antes de que', must keep together. TILING: vas a + ayudarme + antes de que tenga que + ir ✅

seed_pair: I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to go.
Me gusta sentir como si estuviera casi preparado para ir.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I like' → 'me gusta' (gustar construction, M-type). 'feeling' → 'sentir' (gerund → infinitive, A-type). 'as if I'm' → 'como si estuviera' (subjunctive trigger + verb, M-type). 'nearly' → 'casi' (A-type). 'ready' → 'preparado' (A-type). 'to' → 'para' (purpose, A-type). 'to go' → 'ir' (A-type). CRITICAL: 'como si' triggers imperfect subjunctive 'estuviera'. TILING: me gusta + sentir + como si estuviera + casi + preparado + para + ir ✅

seed_pair: I don't like taking too much time to answer.
No me gusta tomar demasiado tiempo para responder.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'not' → 'no' (A-type). 'I like' → 'me gusta' (M-type, already extracted). 'taking' → 'tomar' (gerund → infinitive, A-type). 'too much' → 'demasiado' (M-type: 'too' alone is ambiguous muy/tan/demasiado). 'time' → 'tiempo' (A-type). 'to' → 'para' (purpose, A-type). 'to answer' → 'responder' (A-type). TILING: no + me gusta + tomar + demasiado + tiempo + para + responder ✅

seed_pair: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
Es útil comenzar a hablar tan pronto como puedas.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'it's useful' → 'es útil' (M-type). 'to start talking' → 'comenzar a hablar' (M-type, already extracted). 'as soon as you can' → 'tan pronto como puedas' (CRITICAL EXAMPLE: subjunctive trigger phrase, M-type). METHODOLOGY NOTE: This is the key example from v6.2 - 'puedas' is subjunctive, must keep with trigger 'tan pronto como'. TILING: es útil + comenzar a hablar + tan pronto como puedas ✅

seed_pair: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
Estoy deseando hablar mejor tan pronto como pueda.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I'm looking forward to' → 'estoy deseando' (idiomatic expression, M-type). 'speaking' → 'hablar' (gerund → infinitive, A-type). 'better' → 'mejor' (A-type). 'as soon as I can' → 'tan pronto como pueda' (subjunctive trigger phrase, 1st person, M-type). TILING: estoy deseando + hablar + mejor + tan pronto como pueda ✅

seed_pair: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.
Quería preguntarte algo ayer.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I wanted' → 'quería' (imperfect tense, A-type). 'to ask you' → 'preguntarte' (infinitive + attached pronoun pattern, M-type). 'something' → 'algo' (A-type). 'yesterday' → 'ayer' (A-type). TILING: quería + preguntarte + algo + ayer ✅

key_patterns_identified: Subjunctive triggers: 'antes de que tenga que', 'tan pronto como puedas/pueda', 'como si estuviera'
Gerund → infinitive patterns: 'to start talking' → 'comenzar a hablar'
extraction_summary.validation_notes: All seeds tile perfectly. A-before-M ordering applied. All M-types have components. Pragmatic FD applied throughout (no standalone pronouns/articles without context).
